reg32.name: REG
reg32.doc: Configures the mapping between VSC_PIPE buffer and bin, X/Y specify the bin index in the horiz/vert direction (0,0 is upper left, 0,1 is leftmost bin on second row, and so on). W/H specify the number of bins assigned to this VSC_PIPE in the horiz/vert dimension.

array.name: VSC_SIZE
array.doc: Has the size of data written to corresponding VSC pipe, ie. same thing that is written out to VSC_SIZE_ADDRESS_LO/HI

reg32.name: RB_DEPTH_CNTL
reg32.doc: Z_TEST_ENABLE bit is set for zfunc other than GL_ALWAYS or GL_NEVER

reg32.name: PC_PRIMITIVE_CNTL_1
reg32.doc: num of varyings plus four for gl_Position (plus one if gl_PointSize) plus # of transform-feedback (streamout) varyings if using the hw streamout (rather than stg instructions in shader)
